name: Pirate Defense (itch)
description:
This was made in "about" 1 hour for the weekly hour game jam 26

It was made with unity

Assets made by the guy sitting next to me.

How to play:
  • Click on a ship to shoot it
  • Don't let them reach the center
  • Record your play session
  • Share it with all your friends
  • Give me all your money
  • Force your friends to give me money
